subject: Data
title: The Power of Color Choice
description: A fast breakdown of The Power of Color Choice for builders.

hook.text: A climate change chart used blue-to-red gradients. Viewers instantly understood warming without reading labels.

buildup.text: Color is the most powerful visual channel â€” it can encode categories, intensity, and direction.

discovery.text: Good palettes use intuitive mappings: red for danger, green for growth, blue for cold. Culture matters.

twist.text: Rainbow palettes look pretty but distort data. They create false boundaries where none exist.

climax.text: Colorbrewer, a tool by cartographer Cynthia Brewer, became the gold standard for data color palettes.

punchline.text: The right colors make data speak. The wrong ones make it scream.

quiz.question: Why are rainbow color palettes problematic in data visualization?
options: They create false boundaries and distort perception
